mapper.select: SELECT METER.MDS_ID AS meterId , PREPAY.LASTTOKENDATE AS "date" , CASE WHEN PAYTYPE.NAME = 'Cash' THEN 'Vending Station' WHEN PAYTYPE.NAME = 'Cheque' THEN 'Vending Station' WHEN PAYTYPE.NAME = 'Card' THEN 'Vending Station' WHEN PAYTYPE.NAME = 'Mobile' THEN 'Mobile Money' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS interfaceType , PREPAY.CHARGEDARREARS + PREPAY.CHARGEDCREDIT + DEBT.CHARGEDDEBT AS paidAmount , PREPAY.CHARGEDCREDIT AS chargedAmount , PREPAY.PRE_BALANCE AS beforeBalance , PREPAY.BALANCE AS currentBalance , PREPAY.LASTTOKENID AS chargeId , PREPAY.DAYS_FROM_CHARGE AS daysFromLastCharge , PREPAY.ID AS receiptNo , OP.NAME AS vendorName , PAYTYPE.DESCR AS paymentType , 'GHC' as creditUnit , PREPAY.TOKEN AS token , PREPAY.CANCEL_TOKEN AS cancelToken , PREPAY.CANCEL_DATE AS cancelDate , PREPAY.CHARGEDARREARS AS chargedArrears , DEBT.CHARGEDDEBT AS chargedDebt FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PREPAYMENTLOG PREPAY ON PREPAY.CONTRACT_ID = CONT.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DEBTLOG DEBT ON PREPAY.ID = DEBT.PREPAYMENTLOG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OPERATOR OP ON PREPAY.OPERATOR_ID = OP.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE PAYTYPE ON PREPAY.PAY_TYPE_CODE = PAYTYPE.ID
